title: Tasty Massage
overview: Tae-soo calls for a business trip massage for his sick wife, Hyang-gi, then Yeong-ho, the top of the massage world appears. Hyang-gi falls for Yeong-ho and eventually declares her divorce from Tae-soo. Tae-soo calls for another massage to get his wife back and revenge on Yeong-ho, then Joo-hee, a tomboy comes, and Tae-soo learns to get a massage with Joo-hee's help and tries to find his wife...
